official_title: To establish the Foundation for Ocean and Coastal Conservation in the United States, and for other purposes.
short_title: Foundation for Ocean and Coastal Conservation in the United States Establishment Act

summary.text: Foundation for Ocean and Coastal Conservation in the United States Establishment Act - Establishes the Foundation for Ocean Conservation in the United States to support and enhance the management of National Marine Sanctuaries, National Estuarine Research Reserves, and other coastal, marine, and Great Lakes areas of national significance. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Foundation for Ocean and Coastal Conservation in the United States Establishment Act
To establish the Foundation for Ocean and Coastal Conservation in the United States, and for other purposes.
